result.eng: I was attending meetings all day.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag freastal ar chruinnithe an lá ar fad
result.orig: Bhí mé ag freastal ar chruinnithe an lá ar fad
result.html: Bhí mé ag freastal ar chruinnithe an lá ar fadI was attending meetings all day.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag freastal ar ċruinniṫe an lá ar fadI was attending meetings all day.

result.eng: I was serving people in the restaurant all day.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag freastal ar dhaoine sa bhialann an lá ar fad
result.orig: Bhí mé ag freastal ar dhaoine sa bhialann an lá ar fad
result.html: Bhí mé ag freastal ar dhaoine sa bhialann an lá ar fadI was serving people in the restaurant all day.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag freastal ar ḋaoine sa ḃialann an lá ar fadI was serving people in the restaurant all day.

result.eng: They spent tho whole day cutting turf.
result.ga: Chaith siad an lá ar fad ag baint móna
result.orig: Chaith siad an lá ar fad ag baint móna
result.html: Chaith siad an lá ar fad ag baint mónaThey spent tho whole day cutting turf.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ siad an lá ar fad ag baint mónaThey spent tho whole day cutting turf.

result.eng: He spent his whole life on the island.
result.ga: Chaith sé a shaol ar fad ar an oileán
result.orig: Chaith sé a shaol ar fad ar an oileán
result.html: Chaith sé a shaol ar fad ar an oileánHe spent his whole life on the island.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ sé a ẛaol ar fad ar an oileánHe spent his whole life on the island.

result.eng: She spent her whole life doing that work.
result.ga: Chaith sí a saol ar fad i mbun na hoibre sin
result.orig: Chaith sí a saol ar fad i mbun na hoibre sin
result.html: Chaith sí a saol ar fad i mbun na hoibre sinShe spent her whole life doing that work.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ sí a saol ar fad i mbun na hoibre sinShe spent her whole life doing that work.

result.eng: I stayed home the whole day.
result.ga: D'fhan mé sa bhaile an lá ar fad
result.orig: D'fhan mé sa bhaile an lá ar fad
result.html: D'fhan mé sa bhaile an lá ar fadI stayed home the whole day.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan mé sa ḃaile an lá ar fadI stayed home the whole day.

result.eng: The meeting sucked all my energy out of me.
result.ga: Shúigh an cruinniú an fuinneamh ar fad asam
result.orig: Shúigh an cruinniú an fuinneamh ar fad asam
result.html: Shúigh an cruinniú an fuinneamh ar fad asamThe meeting sucked all my energy out of me.
result.ponchtml: Ṡúiġ an cruinniú an fuinneaṁ ar fad asamThe meeting sucked all my energy out of me.

result.eng: After all the argument, we managed to come to a settlement.
result.ga: Tar éis an aighnis ar fad d'éirigh linn teacht ar réiteach
result.orig: Tar éis an aighnis ar fad d'éirigh linn teacht ar réiteach
result.html: Tar éis an aighnis ar fad d'éirigh linn teacht ar réiteachAfter all the argument, we managed to come to a settlement.
result.ponchtml: Tar éis an aiġnis ar fad d'éiriġ linn teaċt ar réiteaċAfter all the argument, we managed to come to a settlement.

result.eng: All the information is in the leaflet.
result.ga: Tá an t-eolas ar fad sa bhileog
result.orig: Tá an t-eolas ar fad sa bhileog
result.html: Tá an t-eolas ar fad sa bhileogAll the information is in the leaflet.
result.ponchtml: Tá an t-eolas ar fad sa ḃileogAll the information is in the leaflet.

result.eng: All the text is in Irish.
result.ga: Tá an téacs ar fad i nGaeilge
result.orig: Tá an téacs ar fad i nGaeilge
result.html: Tá an téacs ar fad i nGaeilgeAll the text is in Irish.
result.ponchtml: Tá an téacs ar fad i nGaeilgeAll the text is in Irish.

result.eng: It is getting better all the time.
result.ga: Tá sé ag dul i bhfeabhas an t-am ar fad
result.orig: Tá sé ag dul i bhfeabhas an t-am ar fad
result.html: Tá sé ag dul i bhfeabhas an t-am ar fadIt is getting better all the time.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ag dul i ḃfeaḃas an t-am ar fadIt is getting better all the time.

result.eng: There is a leaflet over there. All the information is in it.
result.ga: Tá bileog ansin Tá an t-eolas ar fad ann

result.html: Tá bileog ansin Tá an t-eolas ar fad annThere is a leaflet over there. All the information is in it.

result.eng: It was raining the whole time.
result.ga: Bhí sé ag cur báistí an t-am ar fad

result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ag cur báistí an t-am ar fadIt was raining the whole time.

result.eng: Now, that's three euros ten cents total, please.
result.ga: Anois sin trí euro deich cent ar fad le do thoil

result.html: Anois sin trí euro deich cent ar fad le do thoilNow, that's three euros ten cents total, please.
result.ponchtml: Anois sin trí euro deiċ cent ar fad le do ṫoilNow, that's three euros ten cents total, please.

result.eng: All ten of us were there.

result.html: Deichniúr againn ar fad a bhí annAll ten of us were there.
result.ponchtml: Deiċniúr againn ar fad a ḃí annAll ten of us were there.

result.eng: I watch television all the time.

result.eng: The whole thing is making me afraid.

result.eng: Although we didn't fall out completely, the friendship cooled off.
result.ga: Cé nár thiteamar amach le chéile ar fad tháinig fuacht ar an gcairdeas

result.eng: An airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?
